channel.title: Portforward help!
channel.description:
Ok, i really want to put a server online and I need to portforward. I will tell you everthing i've done.
Went to portforward.com, then i picked my router, looked at everything. - DONE!
went to no-ip.com and made an account, then i went to "add", then i added a server called fluidscape.no-ip.info
The ip address was already filled out then i clicked add
Then, i went to server status page, went to bottom and click the link, then i put in for the ip fluidscape.no-ip.info then i did everything else.
Then i clicked enter and it said "fluidscape is offline, bla bla bla bla bla!
PLEASE HELP ME!

Ok, i really want to put a server online and I need to portforward. I will tell you everthing i’ve done.

Then i clicked enter and it said "fluidscape is offline, bla bla bla bla bla!
